title: Permaban appeal.
body: Hello this is yasutake fuuko and I would like to discuss my lol account being banned indefinitely. I do understand that my behaviour is not good or sportsmanlike which I've been working to improve ovee the past month how ever the last game I plated I was hostile towards my teammate which i can understand a chat restriction or a temporary account suspension but I feel like a simple misunderstanding caused this to be a permaban. I told the friends Leblanc to stay dead my friend which iI believe may have been taken the wrong way, I by no means wished the Leblanc dead in real life. I do believe however i should at least be chat restricted so my actions/words don't go unpunished. I do still wish to play this game and have fun doing so. Please contact me via email at RWBYYasuo@gmail.com thank you for your time.

replies.body: Sorry for your loss, but if you were toxic you deserve it.
Take your email out of your post. If you want to appeal your ban submit a ticket but if it was not in error it will not be overturned.
How does one submit a ticket? I am new to this forums stuff

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Pick the options that relate to you.

Like the thing is I did desirve a chat restriction i won't lie but i didn't think I said anything that would issue a permaban, I may very well be wrong though but at the very least I'd line to know what did cause the punishment to be this

4 tiers of punishment:

1. 10 game chat restrict
2. 25 game chat restrict
3. 14-day ban
4. permaban

anything that can get you punished will get you permabanned if you do it often enough.
If you want to actually discuss the Ban wr need your chatlogs which you got with your ban
Did you already have a 14 day ban?
